content: crown coaster designed by crochetcrafters1 ©2025 crochetcrafters1 - all rights reserved this pattern and its contents are only for personal use do not copy edit redistribute or sell this pattern you are welcome to sell finished products with your own photos in small quantities but if you do so please give pattern credit to crochetcrafters1 thank you and enjoy stitches and abbreviations - this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet back loop tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium - yellow - yarn needle - scissors final size - 10 cm diameter technical notes *all rounds are joined with a slip_stitch *the slip_stitch is worked into the first stitch of the round not one of the chains *at the end of each round is a stitch count in brackets *stitch count does not include chains or slip stitches *link to the youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern crown/coaster yellow round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts round 3 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts round 4 chain 2 make 1 double_crochet in the next 2 sts followed by 2 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 40 sts *work in the back loop only for round 5 round 5 chain 2 make 1 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 40 sts round 6 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet in the first st followed by 1 half_double_crochet and 1 double_crochet in the next st then chain 2 in the next st make 1 double_crochet and 1 half_double_crochet then 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 60 sts *fasten_off link to video https //youtu be/6kntxyfxhmq if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
